column4: my laptop has Unichrome graphics, and im using OpenChrome,but i cant get them to work, glxinfo return "X Error of failed request:  BadAlloc (insufficient resources for operation)"
depends on the chipset. the "via" driver should have dri enabled (for via chipsets that is)
i think my card is VN800, not sure about the chipset thought
I doubt beryl will work with the via chipset since it only provides very simple 3d accelleration. only intel, ati and nvidia supported I think.
